props.body: This section is generated from a template profile and tuned with prompt context.

props.title: Why Choose Beauty Body Bangkok?
props.subtitle: Professional care with modern techniques and warm, attentive service.
props.body: From expert stylists to premium products and flexible booking, each visit is built around comfort and confidence.

props.title: Free Consultation.
props.subtitle: Book a short session to match services with your needs and schedule.
props.body: Our team helps you choose the right treatment path before your first appointment.

props.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.a: We are open daily, including weekends. Please check current hours before visiting.

items.q: Do I need to book in advance?
items.a: Advance booking is recommended for preferred time slots and specialist services.
We use salon-grade products selected for safety, performance, and skin compatibility.

items.q: Can I request a specific stylist?
items.a: Yes. Mention your preferred stylist while booking and we will arrange it when available.

items.q: Do you offer consultation before treatment?
items.a: Yes. We provide consultation to align treatment plans with your goals.
